Text.Language: M/ic P[oic eyrecswpi ecs/p m~pekm~yo n~je tenyucia: e~h~r/i e~jen n/e~te noui~ n~nobi: nem nimetate~mi n~te peklaoc.
Grant, O Lord, that our sacrifice may be accepted before You for my own sins and for the ignorance of Your people.
أعطِ ياربُّ أن تكونَ مقبولةً أمامَكَ ذبيحَتَنا عن خطاياي وجهالاتِ شعبِك.
Ouoh je c~toub/out: kata ]dwrea~ n~te Pekp~neuma eyouab: qen Pi,~rictoc I/couc Pen[oic.
For behold, it is pure according to the gift of Your Holy Spirit, in Christ Jesus our Lord.
ولأنها طاهرةٌ كموهبةِ روحِك القدوس، بالمسيحِ يسوع ربنا.
